Go Back Review Name: Wonderful Review Description: I enquired in the local stores. Every one is saying the rate above 40000 In online I bought in offer. Performance is good. Service engineer for installation got 2450. He said we need to keep the AC compulsory in stand because it will fall if we keep in roof because of inverter ac vibration like that he said. Apart from that it is Value for Money. I don't know about the EB consumption need to check. Worth Buying.
